languages.text: "Эти мон-кай и правда тратят свою короткую жизнь на копошение в мусоре? Почему бы не избрать другой Путь? Обрясть иного себя?"
"Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"
languages.original_text: "Эти мон-кай и правда тратят свою короткую жизнь на копошение в мусоре? Почему бы не избрать другой Путь? Обрясть иного себя?"

traits.locale_text: "Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"
"Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"
"Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"
"Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"

languages.text: “这些猴子真的把他们短暂的生命浪费在了挖掘垃圾上吗？他们为什么不选择另一条道途？寻找另一个自我？”
languages.original_text: "Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"

traits.locale_text: “这些猴子真的把他们短暂的生命浪费在了挖掘垃圾上吗？他们为什么不选择另一条道途？寻找另一个自我？”

languages.text: «¿De verdad estos mon-keigh se pasan sus efímeras vidas excavando desechos? ¿Por qué no eligen otra Senda y encuentran otra identidad?».
languages.original_text: "Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad estos mon-keigh se pasan sus efímeras vidas excavando desechos? ¿Por qué no eligen otra Senda y encuentran otra identidad?».

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイたちは、本当にゴミを掘り返して僅かな人生を過ごしているのか？なぜ彼らは他の道を見つけない？己の手で」
languages.original_text: "Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイたちは、本当にゴミを掘り返して僅かな人生を過ごしているのか？なぜ彼らは他の道を見つけない？己の手で」

languages.text: "Verbringen diese Chem-Pan-Sey ihr kurzes Leben ernsthaft damit, in Müll zu wühlen? Warum wählen sie keinen anderen Weg? Um ein anderes Selbst zu finden?"
languages.original_text: "Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"

traits.locale_text: "Verbringen diese Chem-Pan-Sey ihr kurzes Leben ernsthaft damit, in Müll zu wühlen? Warum wählen sie keinen anderen Weg? Um ein anderes Selbst zu finden?"

languages.text: « Ces mon-keigh passent vraiment leur vie à fouiller dans les ordures ? Pourquoi ne choisissent-ils pas une autre Voie ? Pourquoi ne se réinventent-ils pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"

traits.locale_text: « Ces mon-keigh passent vraiment leur vie à fouiller dans les ordures ? Pourquoi ne choisissent-ils pas une autre Voie ? Pourquoi ne se réinventent-ils pas ? »

languages.text: "Bu mon-keighler kısacık ömürlerini gerçekten inkâr içinde mi geçiriyorlar? Neden kendilerine başka bir Yol bulmuyor, yeni açılımlar yapmıyorlar?"
languages.original_text: "Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu mon-keighler kısacık ömürlerini gerçekten inkâr içinde mi geçiriyorlar? Neden kendilerine başka bir Yol bulmuyor, yeni açılımlar yapmıyorlar?"

languages.original_text: "Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"
